title: New: birthday – Parade
body:
Oakland’s Duran Visek aka **birthday** is like a meticulously crafted amalgamation of a whole myriad of artists – from the subtle pop of Troye Sivan to the heartfelt emotional pleas of Youth Lagoon, he bares all on latest track _Parade_.

With an EP set to be released before the end of the year, 2017 is already shaping up to be a big year for the twenty one year old. Check out Parade below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
